Eileen – The Waters’ Consulting Group is a national leader in compensation studies for all local government departments.  This is a link to their website that discusses the various “pay” related services  http://www.watersconsulting.com/services-products/  which includes:
•   Compensation Program Development & Implementation
•   Compensation Outsourcing
•   Compensation Monitoring
•   Pay Equity Studies
•   Performance Appraisals
•   Training and Development
